WorkItem.Description: Sample Chat program that use TcpClient class and handle basic problems like connecting, disconnecting, sending/receiving ALL bytes asyncronously (very important async send receive!)

Comments.Message:
Hello mladjenovic,

Thank you for using our code sample request service. 

I'd like to confirm with you my understanding of the sample request:
  
    The most major of  your sample idea is how to implement async send and receive function using C/S model. And the better we could provide a sample that it includes message packet sending and receiving using System.Net.Sockets. The sample idea mentioned above is my previous project's topic. It has some data integrity and blocking features. I think that  these feature applied in your sample is a wonderful lightspot. So I have submitted the similar sample idea a few days ago. Then we are waiting for the approved by other team members. Thanks advance for your sample idea. The end I ask a question?Is my understanding correct? Please feel free to  let me know if I misunderstood your needs.


Thanks
